medical_history.chief_complaint: Increasing shortness of breath and hypotension.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient initially presented 2 days prior at an OSH for increasing shortness of breath, with symptoms worsening over time, leading to hypotension (SBP not specified). The patient was treated for hypotension and was then transferred to the ICU for closer monitoring.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Atrial fibrillation, Chronic Kidney Disease, Morbid obesity, Sleep apnea, Diabetes Mellitus Type 2, Hypothyroidism, Diastolic heart failure, Hypertension, Hyperlipidemia.
